suncertify.client.gui

Class ClientConfigDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • suncertify.client.gui.ClientConfigDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ClientConfigDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    The ClientConfigDialog class displays the client configuration dialog during the application client startup process.

    The ClientConfigDialog has a producer/consumer relationship with the the BrokerClient class and this relationship is established during client startup time. The BrokerClient creates an instance of this class and waits until it gets notification from it to proceed with it's startup process.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        A reference to a JButton object serving as the "Exit" button. Activation of this button will result in the termination of the client startup process.

        A reference to a JButton object serving as the "Okay" button. Activation of this button will result in the startup of the client with the values shown in the dialog.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientConfigDialog

        public ClientConfigDialog(AppRunMode mode,
                          java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock lock,
                          java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition condition)
        The constructor. All the components constituting this dialog are created here, this includes the AppConfigOptionsPanel and the button panel.
        Parameters:
        mode - The application run mode
        lock - A reference to a ReentrantLock object
        condition - A reference to a Condition object
        See Also:
        AppConfigOptionsPanel, AppRunMode, BrokerClient.getClientConfigParams(AppRunMode), ReentrantLock, Condition
